Module com.therealworld.fitschedule
Package com.therealworld.fitschedule.controllers

Class DashboardController

java.lang.Object
com.therealworld.fitschedule.controllers.DashboardController
public class DashboardController extends Object
Controller for the Dashboard view, handling the display of today's schedule, navigation buttons, and goal-related features.

    • onYesButtonClick

      public void onYesButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Action method triggered when the "Yes" button is clicked. This method checks the user's fitness events and updates their goals based on their workout activities for the current day. Specifically, it retrieves the user's goals, identifies any fitness events for the current day, calculates the workout hours, and updates the progress on goals with a period type of either "Days per week" or "Hours per week." If a goal is completed, it marks the goal as completed, increments the user's total goals completed, and awards a badge for the goal type.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the "Yes" button click.

    • onNoButtonClick

      public void onNoButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Action method triggered when the "No" button is clicked. This method calculates the workout hours that need to be rescheduled, identifies available time slots for the next day, and displays rescheduling options to the user based on their availability.

      Specifically, it performs the following steps:

      • Calculates the total workout hours for the current day.
      • Finds consecutive time slots available on the following day for rescheduling.
      • Displays an alert with available time slots for the user to select from.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the "No" button click.

    • insertAcceptedTimeForWorkout

      public void insertAcceptedTimeForWorkout(int userId, String[] acceptedTimeSlots, String dayOfWeek, String eventName, String eventDescription, boolean isFitnessEvent, String weekStartDate)
      Inserts the accepted rescheduled workout time slots into the user's weekly schedule and fitness events table. This method iterates through each accepted time slot and adds it as a scheduled event in the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user for whom the workout is being rescheduled.
      acceptedTimeSlots - An array of consecutive time slots for the rescheduled workout.
      dayOfWeek - The day of the week for the rescheduled workout.
      eventName - The name of the workout event.
      eventDescription - A description of the workout event.
      isFitnessEvent - A boolean indicating if the event is a fitness-related activity.
      weekStartDate - The start date of the week in which the workout is being rescheduled.
